bio: Kathleen MacMahon is a Software Development Manager for [Harmony Information Systems](http://www.harmonyis.com/) with over ten years development experience. Current project is a an Enterprise Software Solution, developed in Silverlight 4.0, .NET 4.0 and WCF RIA Services. Kathleen can be found on Twitter as @[kmacmahon](http://twitter.com/kmacmahon).
